```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(paletteer)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Read in Data
```{r}
metrics <- read_csv(here("data", "alldata_forbivalvemodel2.csv"))

bivalve <- read_csv(here("data", "LookUpTable.csv"), col_names = FALSE)

bivalves <- rename(bivalve, site_no = X1,
       lon = X2,
       lat = X3,
       yield = X4,
       yield_1000 = X5)
```
